sentences.en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
sentences.cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

sentences.en: All day she had fought off the impulse to telephone Harry.
sentences.cn: 她一整天都在克制自己想给哈里打电话的冲动。

sentences.en: He bellowed information into the mouthpiece of his portable telephone.
sentences.cn: 他对着手机话筒吼了一通信息。

sentences.en: He edged closer to the telephone, ready to grab it.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢挪向电话机，准备抓起听筒。

sentences.en: I excused myself and ran back to the telephone.
sentences.cn: 我说了声抱歉，跑回到电话机旁。

sentences.en: I just had a feeling that it was Santero on the telephone.
sentences.cn: 我隐隐觉得打电话的是桑特罗。

sentences.en: I ripped out the telephone wire that ran through to his office.
sentences.cn: 我把通到他办公室的电话线拔掉了。

sentences.en: I stayed obstinately in my room, sitting by the telephone.
sentences.cn: 我执意呆在房间里，坐在电话机旁边。

sentences.en: I'll telephone you as soon as I get home.
sentences.cn: 我一到家就给你打电话。

sentences.en: Linda remained on the telephone to the police for three hours.
sentences.cn: 琳达在电话里和警察谈了3个小时。

sentences.en: Mr Dennis said he had requested access to a telephone.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯先生说他已经请求使用电话。

sentences.en: Sammy telephoned to say that he would be late.
sentences.cn: 萨米打电话来说他要晚到。

sentences.en: She suddenly realized that Wim was reciting Kirk's telephone number.
sentences.cn: 她突然意识到威姆正在念的是柯克的电话号码。

sentences.en: The Chief Constable's clipped tones crackled over the telephone line.
sentences.cn: 电话线那头噼里啪啦地传来警察局长短促的声音。

sentences.en: The telephone is one of the great tyrannies of modern life.
sentences.cn: 电话是现代生活中让人最反感的必需品之一。

sentences.en: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
While I was working on my letter the telephone rang.
sentences.cn: 我正在写信，电话铃响了。

words.tran_cn: [通信] 电话的；用电话传送的；电话机的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 手机；移动电话；大哥大

trans.tran_cn: 电话，电话机，（电话机的）话筒，受话器
trans.tran_en: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

trans.tran_cn: 以电话传送（消息），给（某人）打电话，用电话与（某人）交谈
